summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2884, for the improvement of Stroud Avenue, from East Green Lake Way to the north margin of North 82nd Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, constructing concrete sidewalks with the necessary wooden cross walks, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, by the reconstruction of the existing watermains where necessary, under Ordinance No. 35066 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
